content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Extraction and Storage at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) storing extracted coal

### Iron Ore Extraction and Processing at Position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) storing extracted iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-23.0, y=-66.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Copper and Iron Ore Processing with Belt Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) extracting copper ore and iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-23.0, y=-66.0) processing ores
- Belt Group at positions (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-22.5, y=-64.5) transporting ores to the furnace

### Idle Furnace at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) currently not processing due to lack of ingredients

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Idle Furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to process. Check the inventory and supply the required resources to avoid idle status.

### Efficient Resource Management
- Regularly check the inventory of chests and furnaces to ensure they are not overfilled or under-supplied, which can lead to inefficiencies in production.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
